catalog_info.title: Introduction to Computational Biology and Bioinformatics
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Good quantitative skills, strong interest in biology, good programming skills in C/C++, Java, Perl or Python.
catalog_info.description: Meets with Statistics 115, but graduate students are required to do more coding, complete a research project and submit a written report during reading period in addition to completing all work assigned for Statistics 115.
